alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; North Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 1:11PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Walton and southwestern Holmes Counties through 145 PM EDT/1245 PM CDT/... At 111 PM EDT/1211 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles west of De Funiak Springs to 8 miles south of Destin. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Westville, Oakwood Hills, Portland, Alpine Heights, Villa Tasso, Cerrogordo, Blue Mountain Beach, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Seaside, Rock Hill, Pleasant Ridge and Center Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Holmes; North Walton; South Walton
